pchoy wrote:
> Hi,
> 
> I implemented my own writer processor and somehow 
> I need to output some of the attributes from CoreAttributeContants.
> For example I'd like to get the A_LAST_MODIFIED_HEADER value.
> But doing curi.containsKey() returned false.
> Is changing the order.xml enough or I need to do something more.

Not all the CrawlURI attributes are always filled-in. The 
A_LAST_MODIFIED_HEADER value, for example, is only filled-in by the (new 
in 1.12.0) FetchHistoryProcessor. If you want this and related values to 
be loaded into the CrawlURI after fetching, add this Processor after 
fetching completes.

> Also I want to add attributes to the CrawlURI object to pass along
> the processor chain.  For example, I want it to include the 
> language and original Anchor string.  How can I do it? 

You can use the various put[something] methods on CrawlURI (putObject, 
putString, putLong, etc.), or if you need to be more fancy, use 
CrawlURI.getAlist() to get the attribute-holding AList structure and use 
its methods.

> Thanks very much in advanced.

You're welcome, good luck!

- Gordon @ IA
